metadata.shortInfo: Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

3RACE polyA-capture N2 emb-thru-adult 454 alignments pilot. In this pilot study, 3UTRs were isolated from specific stages of C. elegans N2 worms, including embryos, L1, L2, L3, and L4 larva, and adults, and RNA isolated using a poly-A capturing technique. RNAs were barcoded, mixed together, and amplified, prior to sequencing on the Roche 454 platform. This submission reflects the alignments of the deconvoluted, stage-specific reads to WS190 genome using BLAT.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

3RACE polyA-capture  daf-11 dauer 454 alignments. The 3 untranslated region (3UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE Illumina sequencing & alignment. Minipools containing 3'UTRs were amplified from mixed-stage N2 animals with target-specific primers.  These minipools may contain potentially different 3'UTR isoforms and were generated from cloning 3'RACE products for each targeted gene. Illumina generated sequences were aligned to the WS190 genome using Bowtie.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE Illumina sequencing & alignment. Minipools containing 3'UTRs were amplified from mixed-stage N2 animals with target-specific primers.  These minipools may contain potentially different 3'UTR isoforms and were generated from cloning 3'RACE products for each targeted gene. Illumina generated sequences were aligned to the WS190 genome using Bowtie.

3RACE polyA-capture N2 L1 454 alignments. 3UTRs were isolated from L1 larva of C. elegans N2 worms using a poly-A capturing technique. RNAs were sequenced on the Roche 454 platform. This submission reflects the alignments of the deconvoluted, hermaphrodite adult stage-specific reads to WS190 genome using BLAT.

3RACE polyA-capture N2 emb-thru-adult 454 alignments pilot. In this pilot study, 3UTRs were isolated from specific stages of C. elegans N2 worms, including embryos, L1, L2, L3, and L4 larva, and adults, and RNA isolated using a poly-A capturing technique. RNAs were barcoded, mixed together, and amplified, prior to sequencing on the Roche 454 platform. This submission reflects the alignments of the deconvoluted, stage-specific reads to WS190 genome using BLAT.

miRNA isolation and 454 sequencing from him-8 male spermatids. small RNAs (<200 bp) were isolated from him-8 spermatids and sequenced on the Roche 454 platform, and aligned to the WS190 genome using MegaBlast.

miRNA isolation and Illumina sequencing from eri-1. small RNAs (<200 bp) were isolated from eri-(mg366) young adults and sequenced on the Illumina platform, and aligned to the WS190 genome using MegaBlast.

miRNA isolation and Illumina sequencing from glp-4. small RNAs (<200 bp) were isolated from glp-4(bn2) young adults and sequenced on the Illumina platform, and aligned to the WS190 genome using MegaBlast.

3RACE polyA-capture N2 emb-thru-adult 454 alignments pilot. In this pilot study, 3UTRs were isolated from specific stages of C. elegans N2 worms, including embryos, L1, L2, L3, and L4 larva, and adults, and RNA isolated using a poly-A capturing technique. RNAs were barcoded, mixed together, and amplified, prior to sequencing on the Roche 454 platform. This submission reflects the alignments of the deconvoluted, stage-specific reads to WS190 genome using BLAT.

3RACE polyA-capture N2 L4 454 alignments. 3UTRs were isolated from L4 larva of C. elegans N2 worms using a poly-A capturing technique. RNAs were sequenced on the Roche 454 platform. This submission reflects the alignments of the deconvoluted, L4 stage-specific reads to WS190 genome using BLAT.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.
